thread.title: Walmart buys a major stake in India's Flipkart

title: Walmart buys a major stake in India's Flipkart
text:
Walmart buys a major stake in India's Flipkart Wednesday, May 09, 2018 - 02:14
Walmart said on Wednesday it will pay $16 billion for a roughly 77 percent stake in Indian e-commerce firm Flipkart in an effort to compete with rival Amazon in an important growth market. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Walmart said on Wednesday it will pay $16 billion for a roughly 77 percent stake in Indian e-commerce firm Flipkart in an effort to compete with rival Amazon in an important growth market.
